writer.name: 皮娅·弗兰肯贝格 Pia Frankenberg

director.name: 皮娅·弗兰肯贝格 Pia Frankenberg

introduction: A woman and a man clash in a Hamburg bar: she slaps him (almost) out of nowhere. His reaction - a completely different one than expected: the attack is taken as an offence and starts a series of liberating beatings that spread through the city like wildfire."Someone can't just smack me and declare it art." This statement by the then Minister of the Interior Zimmermann about his understanding of art and the change he initiated in the guidelines for film funding was the starting point for Pia Frankenberg's second film.
